name: LowPolyExplorer
description:
Exploration

Explore moons, asteroids, planets , abandonned structures, in a low poly universe with your rover!

Varied Environnement

The game is offering multiple differents environnements to blow your mind, do some research by exploring to upgrade your rover and to go further in the universe.

Story

You're starting on a small asteroid and you must explore to discover the secrets of this world.
